data.title: Silvio Berlusconi, AC Milan (with The Cooligans Podcast)
data.meta_description: Listen to this episode from Owned with Rex Chapman on Spotify. Some have called him the Italian Trump, or maybe Trump is the American Berlusconi... In any case, we're talking about former AC Milan owner and Italian Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi. Berlusconi has quite the history, and we walk through it with Christian Polanco and Alexis Guerreros of The Cooligans Podcast.  Subscribe to SiriusXM Podcasts+ on Apple Podcasts to listen to ad-free episodes.
